original_text: Now when Jehoram was risen up to the kingdom of his father, he strengthened himself, and slew all his brethren with the sword, and divers also of the princes of Israel.
korean_text: 여호람이 그의 아버지의 왕국을 다스리게 되어 세력을 얻은 후에 그의 모든 아우들과 이스라엘 방백들 중 몇 사람을 칼로 죽였더라

sentences.original_text: Now when Jehoram was risen up
to the kingdom of his father
and slew all his brethren with the sword
and divers also of the princes of Israel
